title: ML: Confusion Matrix Interpretation
story: A confusion matrix shows the full picture: TN, FP, FN, TP. Understanding it is key to choosing the right metric.
instructions: Extract TP (True Positives) from confusion matrix [[50, 10], [5, 35]]. Format: [[TN, FP], [FN, TP]]. Print TP.
starterCode:
import numpy as np

# Confusion matrix: [[TN, FP], [FN, TP]]
conf_matrix = np.array([[50, 10], [5, 35]])

# Extract TP (bottom-right)
TP = conf_matrix[1, 1]

print(TP)
solutionHidden:
import numpy as np

conf_matrix = np.array([[50, 10], [5, 35]])

TP = conf_matrix[1, 1]

print(TP)

hints.text: Format: [[TN, FP], [FN, TP]]. TP is at position [1,1] (bottom-right).
